mapper.sql: id, book_id, dealed_num, selling_price, rental_price, district_id, user_id, datetime, selled, rented
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bk_dealed_book (book_id, dealed_num, selling_price, rental_price, district_id, user_id, datetime, selled, rented) VALUES (#{bookId},#{dealedNum},#{sellingPrice},#{rentalPrice}, #{districtId},#{userId},#{datetime},#{selled}, #{rented})
mapper.update: UPDATE bk_dealed_book SET book_id=#{bookId}, dealed_num=#{dealedNum}, selling_price=#{sellingPrice}, rental_price=#{rentalPrice}, district_id=#{districtId}, user_id=#{userId}, datetime=#{datetime}, selled=#{selled}, rented=#{rented} WHERE id=#{id}
